name: Euro Global Conference on Recycling and Waste Management
content: We welcome all the passionate people from all around the globe to join us for the “Euro Global Conference on Recycling and Waste Management” (Recycling 2022) which is going to be held in Paris, France as a hybrid event during September 19-20, 2022\. This Recycling conference will provide a strong and energising manifesto, as well as a strong emphasis on its theme “Re-TRACE: Re-Inventing Tomorrow through Recycling Advancements and Carbon Efficiency.” The two-day congress is primarily concerned with two major topics: recycling and waste management. Recycling 2022 is primarily focused on recent trends, advancements and addressing global issues through novel ideas and findings of researchers, scientists, environmentalists, ecologists, academicians, and experts from recycling industries. The plenary talks, keynote forums, scientific sessions, invited talks, symposiums, panel discussions and oral and poster presentations will provide optimal atmosphere for disseminating and gaining current knowledge in the field of Recycling and Waste Management. We are certain that our hybrid global summit of Recycling 2022 will not only bring together industry executives and high-level speakers from all corners of the globe to keep up with the latest policy developments impacting recycling, but will also provide a secure atmosphere to network at ease.
